Text: TW Station Discrete Adds Cc Please add the following discrete points to the Station poll and add to the gas control screen Thanks Todd AC Power Failure Oily Waste Water Tank Level High

Station Pressure Regulator Cc Earlier this week I installed some new functions at station for ease in controlling the pressure regulator when the station is down Please install the following discrete and control points They will effect the setpoint on register Input showing flow direction west east Will put the control in West Flow write a to this Will put the control in East Flow write a to this If this doesnt make any sense please let me know Thanks Todd

RE La Plata Unit Fuel Valve Changeout Cc Nowhere Yet I still have it on my plans to do Todd Original Message From Choquette Gary Sent Tuesday February AM To Roensch David SanJuanLaPlata Team Ingalls Todd Cc Graves Jerry Schoolcraft Darrell Asante Ben Subject La Plata Unit Fuel Valve Changeout Has there been an outage scheduled to replace the fuel valve on unit at La Plata Todd where do we stand with the station control modifications

Alstom Motor Gallup Station Cc The status of the Gallup motor is as follows I will try to keep everyone updated as I find answers to any questions Please feel free to call me at The motor is in the IRS shop in Farmington NM and has had the exciter and rotor removed It is to the point that you can get inside and look at some of the damage but until the stator is torn down we will not be able to see anymore This will be a destructive move and we dont want to start this until a final decision has been made as to the process of repairing the stator The stator is damaged to the extent of rewinding the motor in the opinion of the Alstom rep The opinion of the shop foreman at IRS is that they can repair the motor but it will take weeks to make the coils and weeks to install them The other option is to see what can be done at Rugby England The following letter was sent to Alstom in Rugby along with some attachments of resin properties that we have on site Paul Savory is going to contact them at am MST and discuss this with them I have set up a conference call on our bridge for am in hopes to get some of these questions answered The number is Pin The following is a copy of the letter that Paul Savory of Alstom sent his people in England The motor has been stripped at the IRS workshop at Farmington New Mexico phase breaks down at aroundV The fault appears to be at the bottom of a slot approximately of the way down the core Therefore it would seem that the motor needs a rewind Therefore there are several questions that Enron would like answers to urgently IRS have told Enron myself that they can manufacture new coils strip rewind the core VPI the windings but this is obviously providing that we approve attached is the spec from the resin they use at their workshop Would we supply a person to oversee the strip rewind especially as Enron want to know why the motor has failed What is the time scale for manufacture delivery of coils from the UK What is the time scale for a fully wound core from the UK Is there another similar motor available that we can supply Please keep in mind that this motor has to meet the same criteria if it is rewound VPI impregnated here ie same rating horsepower etc Please respond by EMail to A conference call has been set up for hours USA time Monday which is hours UK time Please arrange for whoever is necessary to sit in You will have to call USA After this you will be asked to enter a pin No You will then be in on the conference Should you have any problems please call Todd Ingalls on US
